item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Congress Tavern located downtown on Orange St. between Waybosset & Pine Streets. This was also the location for the P-Collective 3rd Anniversary Party.

So, most of you know the place if you came for the 3rd Anniversary Party, but for those who didn't make it, here is your chance to check out one of the newest pubs in downtown. It has a homey atmosphere in an upscale pub setting and isn't too big or too small - its just right.

Also, it happens that THIS Monday is Allie's Birthday!!!!!!! So come down, celebrate, socialize and let's have some fun on the first day back to work after the holiday weekend, and let's check it out!!! Oh, and I heard a rumor about cake..............

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing some kind of scarf!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Congress Tavern!
